long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify complex text instantly with Explain with AI! Just highlight any text on a webpage, and a quick, context-aware explanation will pop up, making it easy to understand jargon, technical terms, and unfamiliar phrases without leaving the page.
